value.string:
<tal:block replace="nothing"
 xmlns:tal="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/tal"
 xmlns:metal="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/metal"
 xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n"/>
 
 <tal:block define="dummy python: request.RESPONSE.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/css;; charset=utf-8')"/>
 
 /*========================================================================================
 DeclarationDeTVA_ListBox_asAttachedFile CSS.
 
 ========================================================================================*/
 
 
 .attachment_list_ListContent li a,
 .attachment_list_ListContent li .attachment_list_getSourceReference,
 .attachment_list_ListContent li .attachment_list_content_type,
 .attachment_list_ListContent li .attachment_list_getOwner,
 .attachment_list_ListContent li .attachment_list_creation_date{
 padding:2px;
 }
 
 .attachment_list_ListContent li a{
 text-decoration:underline;
 }
 
 .attachment_list_ListContent li .attachment_list_content_type{
 display:none;
 }
 
 .attachment_list_ListContent li .attachment_list_getSourceReference{
 color:#0B850B;
 }
 
 /*.attachment_list_ListContent li .attachment_list_getOwner,
 .attachment_list_ListContent li .attachment_list_creation_date{
 position:absolute;
 margin-top:1.2em;
 }*/
 
 .attachment_list_ListContent li .attachment_list_creation_date{
 left:80px;
 }
 
 .attachment_list_ListContent li .attachment_list_getOwner{
 left:30px;
 }
 
 .attachment_list_ListContent li{
 margin-bottom: 1em;
 }
 
 .attachment_list_ListContent .attachment_list_getOwner{
 font-weight:bold;
 }
 
 .attachment_list_ListContent .added_by,
 .attachment_list_ListContent .attachment_list_getOwner,
 .attachment_list_ListContent .at,
 .attachment_list_ListContent .attachment_list_creation_date{
 font-style: italic;
 }
